sentences.sContent: a metropolitan area of South Australia

sentences.sContent: ...None of the chain’s stores in the Washington metropolitan area are to be closed...
...why the Salt Lake City metro area is one of the 100 largest metropolitan areas most likely to lift the fortunes of the poor and the Atlanta metro area is one of the least likely...
